insert into biz_purchase_order
id,sid,sname,cid,cname,ctime,finish,total, vid, vname, vtime, status, ftime, remark,
#{id},#{sid},#{sname},#{cid},#{cname},#{ctime},0,#{total}, #{vid}, #{vname}, #{vtime}, #{status}, #{ftime}, #{remark},

INSERT INTO biz_purchase_order_sub(pid, cid, cname, num, price, remain_num) VALUES
(#{i.pid},#{i.cid},#{i.cname},#{i.num},#{i.price},#{i.remain_num})
mapper.update: update biz_purchase_order set sid=#{sid}, sname=#{sname}, status=#{status}, total=#{total}, remark=#{remark} where id = #{id}
update biz_purchase_order set status=2, vid=#{vid}, vname=#{vname}, vtime=#{vtime} where id = #{id} and status = 1
update biz_purchase_order set status=0 where id = #{id} and status = 1
mapper.delete: delete from biz_purchase_order where id = #{id} and status = 0
mapper.select: select count(0) from biz_purchase_order where status = 2 and finish = 2 and ftime between unix_timestamp(cast(sysdate() as date) - interval 1 day) * 1000 and unix_timestamp(cast(sysdate() as date)) * 1000

select t1.*, t2.name cname from (select a.cid, ifnull(sum(a.num * a.price), 0) purchase from biz_purchase_order_sub a join biz_purchase_order b on a.pid = b.id where b.vtime between #{start} and #{end} group by a.cid) t1 join sys_category t2 on t1.cid = t2.id
